taxon.author: C. L. Koch, 1840
taxon.distribution: Europe to Central Asia. Introduced to USA, Mexico, Brazil, Chile

referenceObject.reference: Koch, C. L. (1840a). Die Arachniden. C. H. Zeh'sche Buchhandlung, Nürnberg, Siebenter Band, pp. 107-130, pl. 248-252 (f. 585-594); Achter Band, pp. 1-40, pl. 248-264 (f. 595-620).
